summary.span: Holds the stack of server channel sinks.

span.span: Holds the stack of server channel sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別可讓連結要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information.

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分派的訊息表示遠端物件上的要求方法呼叫。The dispatched message represents a request method call on a remote object. 方法僅供.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構時，僅供使用。The method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure. 您不應該它直接呼叫。You should not call it directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法僅供.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構時，僅供使用。The method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure. 您不應該它直接呼叫。You should not call it directly. 方法應該只由來完成非同步分派的傳輸接收呼叫。The method should be only called by a transport sink to complete an asynchronous dispatch.
